{{Description|A circus performance evokes nightmarish memories for [[Collei]]. What kind of grim past does she have for such a thing to push her to the brink of a breakdown?}}
'''Fools Trick''' is Chapter 10 of the ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' [[manga]].

==Summary==
[[Amber]] and [[Collei]] eat and play games until a circus performance occurs that night. The girls watch the clowns perform until their magic show begins and selects Collei as their lucky volunteer. The lead clown instructs her to enter the large box, from which she is transported to a smaller box for the magic trick. Trapped and suffocating, Collei is brought back to the memories of the [[Fatui]]'s experimentations on her until Amber suddenly opens the box as Collei accidentally stabs her with a sword prop in shock. After the show, they continue playing more games until [[Kaeya]] approaches Collei. He informs her that Amber left to look for more Fatui devices and that she'll meet up at Hare's Tail Tavern. He offers to take Collei, which she reluctantly agrees to.

Kaeya escorts her to an empty alley in [[Mondstadt City|Mondstadt]].
